content: mini christmas tree garland this garland is a fun way to add a touch of christmas cheer to any home each tree only takes about 15-20 minutes to knit up making this a quick project that can also be used as decorations on your christmas tree or as a last minute gift measurements each tree measures approximately 3 25 x 4 25 8 x 11cm each pom pom measures approximately 2 5cm in diameter gauge n/a needle size use the recommended needle size for the yarn you are using i used us 6 4mm needles and a dk weight yarn yarn body of tree- dk weight sandnes garn peer gynt in the color 9572 8yds / 7m / 4g per tree trunk of tree- dk weight sandnes garn peer gynt in the color 2652 1yd / 1m / 0 5g per tree trunk pom poms- dk weight sandnes garn peer gynt in the color 1001 4yds / 4m / 2g per pom pom 1 yd/m of twine or yarn for hanging the garland notions yarn needle scissors all measurements and yardages are approximations and are rounded abbreviations k knit k2tog knit 2 sts together rs
